a.h1: Davis County CSD One School… One Community… One Goal… The Best That We Can Be!

div.h5: Welcome to Davis County Community School District
div.p: One School... One Community... One Goal... The Best That We Can Be!

div.style: border: solid 1px #ffffff; padding: 8px 10px; border-radius: 12px; display: inline-block; background: rgba(200,175,125,1.0);
border: solid 1px #ffffff; padding: 8px 10px; border-radius: 12px; display: inline-block; background: rgba(109,41,56,1.0);

div.p:
Please use the link below to access the latest information the district is passing along about the Coronavirus. Coronavirus (COVID-19) Information
Updated 3/13/2020

Davis County Community,
Today, Friday April 17, 2020 Governor Kim Reynolds announced that all schools in Iowa will remain closed through the end of the school year to...
What are your favorite things about school? Share pictures, comments, or videos. #Mustangsloveachallenge

Music Booster Fundraiser Status: All order forms and money have been turned in at this point to our knowledge. The delivery is delayed at this point due to the school closure. The Boosters and directors will be working with the fundraising company and the school to establish a new delivery date when we have a safe location to distribute the items and can safely send students to peoples homes to deliver. We do not know that date yet. We will be making an announcement on the “Davis County High School Band” Facebook page, the school website and Facebook page, and an email to all of our students and parents that have provided the school an email.
Thank you everyone for your patience. This is just one of many things that is up in the air at this time and we will work through it the best we can. Thank you to everyone for your support of the Music Boosters!

Here are the other pictures....I am not sure why they did not upload with the previous post.
#BETHELIGHT #DCSTRONG view image

We want our Graduating Class of 2020 to know just how much your school and community loves you!!
We want to thank McKane Wells for his amazing drone skills! We hope that you enjoy the pictures and the short video that he has prepared.
https://youtu.be/f04LJHgKbEw
#BETHELIGHT #DCSTRONG view image

Attention Elementary Parents - In an attempt to streamline our efforts to support voluntary learning at the PK and elementary level during the closure, teachers are developing some suggested weekly activities for our PK through 4th grade students. Please check out the new link with suggested weekly learning activities located on our DC School District Website. Elementary Resources - Suggested weekly activities by grade level! When you open that link you will find a folder for every grade level with suggested activities in all content areas that can be used to support your child’s continued learning anytime during the week. These plans will be updated on Monday of every week moving forward. You can also refer back to look at previous weekly plans. As always you can contact your child’s classroom teacher if you have any questions!

Seniors, Please know that we will continue to work on making graduation a special occasion. There will be more information posted soon. Check out the football stadium. The lights will be on every Friday evening from 8:00-8:20pm to honor the Class of 2020. Miss seeing you all!

Davis County CSD
608 S Washington St
Bloomfield, IA 52537
Phone: (641) 664-2200

It is the policy of the Davis County Community School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact the district's equity coordinator: Becky Zesiger, Director of Instruction/At-Risk Coordinator | Davis County CSD | 608 S. Washington | Bloomfield, IA 52537 | (641) 664-2200 x.5 | becky.zesiger@dcmustangs.com
